uvi.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.10.43
uvi.description:
wireguard: allowedips: free empty intermediate nodes when removing single node

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.43 by commit df3b45f6d1ce605120750b983fc4448e3769619a, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit e7096c131e5161fa3b8e52a650d7719d2857adfd. For more details please see the references link.
